Class Checker

java.lang.Object
Checker
public class Checker extends Object
Collection of methods for checking if formatting

  • Method Details

    • isValidPPS

      public static boolean isValidPPS(String ppsNumber)
      Validates the format of a PPS number.
      Parameters:
      ppsNumber - The PPS number to check.
      Returns:
      true if the format is correct, false otherwise.

    • isStringInDepartment

      public static boolean isStringInDepartment(String value, Class<Employee.JobCategory> enumClass)
      Checks whether a given string matches the name a department.
      Parameters:
      value - the string to be compared
      enumClass - the employee department value
      Returns:
      True or False

    • isStringInRole

      public static boolean isStringInRole(String value, Class<Employee.JobType> enumClass)
      Checks whether a given string matches the name of any constant in a specified enum class.
      Parameters:
      value - the string to be compared
      enumClass - the employee job type emun
      Returns:
      True or False

    • isStringInCSVColumn

      public static boolean isStringInCSVColumn(String csvFilePath, int columnIndex, String targetString)
      Checks whether a string is present in a column of a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - the file path for the csv
      columnIndex - the column to check
      targetString - the string to search for in the specified column
      Returns:
      True or False

    • findHighestScalePoint

      public static int findHighestScalePoint(String csvFilePath, String targetRole)
      Finds the highest scale point for a specified role in a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - the file path for the csv
      targetRole - the role for which the highest scale point is to be found
      Returns:
      the highest scale point for the specified role, or if the role is not found or if the scale point data is unavailable

    • canBeInteger

      public static boolean canBeInteger(String str)
      Checks if a given string can be parsed as an integer.
      Parameters:
      str - the string to be checked
      Returns:
      True or False

    • findRowByPPS

      public static int findRowByPPS(String csvFilePath, String ppsNumber, int ppsColumnIndex)
      Finds the row number of a given PPS number in employee.csv
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - the file path for the csv
      ppsNumber - the PPS number to search for
      ppsColumnIndex - the index of the column containing PPS numbers
      Returns:
      the row number of the PPS number, or if the PPS number is not found

    • getRowByIndex

      public static String getRowByIndex(String csvFilePath, int rowIndex)
      Retrieves a row from a CSV file by its index.
      Parameters:
      csvFilePath - the file path for the csv.
      rowIndex - The row to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A string array representing the row, or null if the index is out of bounds or an error occurs.
